login_info: Use your LABS domain account credentials to log into the system.
name: Name
no_criteria_available: No criteria available. Please add a new one.
skills_hint: Include programming languages, frameworks, and relevant experience
email_hint: We'll use this to contact you
no_applications_message: You haven't applied to any projects. Browse the marketplace to find interesting projects!
no_applications_received: No one has applied to this project yet.
no_projects_message: You haven't created any projects. Create one to get started!
please_enter_a_valid_email_address: Please enter a valid email address
the_description_must_have_at_least_10_ch: The description must have at least 10 characters
the_name_must_have_at_least_3_characters: The name must have at least 3 characters
export_complete_study_year: Export complete study year data including projects, students, grades, links, and metadata
no_study_years_available_for_export: No study years available for export
critical_operation_warning:
This is a critical operation.
This operation will reset the database, all tables would be deleted and recreated, after that all coordinators would be re-added.
This action will delete all data except coordinators from database forever, that's really really long, are you sure you want to do this?

Are you sure you want to proceed?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_the_proj: Are you sure you want to remove this project?? It will remove this project forever, it's a very very long time. üì¢ Warning!: Deleting projects that are assigned to defense is not allowed!
type_yes_to_delete_the_project: Type 'Yes' if you are sure of this.
confirm_activate_semester: activate the evaluation card for the second semester, the entire evaluation process will start from the beginning for the second semester.
confirm_publish_all: publish all projects, evaluation cards will be available for students to view.
confirm_open_registration: open the project marketplace registration for students to submit their project applications.
registration_not_possible: It is not possible to register for the defense yet. Please wait for the coordinator to publish the defense schedule.
rebuild_warning: rebuild defense schedule - schedule will be irreversibly removed, you will need to create a new one
archive_warning: archive defense schedule - schedule will be irreversibly archived, you will need to create a new one
no_supervisor_projects_message: No projects assigned to this supervisor.
auto_generated_report: This is an automatically generated report.
project_contact: Contact to project owner ‚Äì by default your st.amu.edu.pl email address
step_save_form: Save the form by clicking Create Submission. The project will appear on the Project Marketplace list.
my_project_desc: Tab available only for the project owner. It allows:
edit_project_option: ability to edit the project ‚Äì Edit project
accept_reject_applications: accepting or rejecting candidate applications to the team
send_to_supervisor: submitting the project to supervisor (promoter) ‚Äì Send to supervisor
accept_candidates_desc: To accept candidates to the project:
approve_reject_candidates: For selected candidates approve via Approve or reject via Reject the application.
submit_supervisor_desc: To submit a project to supervisor:
select_project_to_submit: Select the project you want to send for acceptance.
choose_supervisor: Select the chosen supervisor from the list.
supervisor_availability_note: Note: The supervisor must have defined and available capacity to be able to accept the project. Information about availability can be found in the Project Groups ‚Üí Supervisor availability tab.
before_joining_desc: Before joining a project, familiarize yourself with the list of active projects.
step_choose_project: Choose a project that interests you. Navigate by clicking on the selected project and join using Apply to project.
step_submit_application: Send the request to join the team via Submit Application.
owner_decision: The project owner makes the decision to accept or reject the application. You can check the status of your application in the My Applications tab.
my_applications_desc: Tab for students applying to projects. Allows checking the status of applications:
accept_projects_desc: To display the list of projects waiting for acceptance:
select_accept_reject: Select a project and click Accept or Reject.
after_acceptance: After acceptance, you become the supervisor (promoter) of the given project, and the project is automatically moved to the Project Groups tab.
statistics_desc: The Statistics view is available exclusively for coordinators. It allows verification of results and data of all groups in relation to individual project criteria.
stats_review_results: review group results according to defined criteria,
stats_change_view: To switch chart type (bar / pie), click the Change view button.
student_info_desc: The Student Information view is available exclusively for coordinators. It allows verification of all students' data and downloading their information in PDF format.
student_info_download_pdf: download detailed student information as a PDF file.
pg_student_open_project: To open a project you are a member of:
pg_select_project: Select your project from the list.
pg_redirected_details: You will be redirected to the project details view.
pg_owner_permissions: If you have project owner permissions, you can:
pg_add_links_files: add and update links and files, such as:
pg_versioned_note: All links and files are versioned  every change is saved and available in project history.
pg_fill_criteria: Fill in: semester, expected criteria, required criteria.
pg_criteria_appear: Added criteria will appear in the Criteria tab of the project.
pg_supervisor_lock: After entering all criteria, the project supervisor can lock them from editing.
pg_grade_card_desc: The project view also includes a grade card divided by semesters: first semester, second semester.
pg_filled_by_supervisor: The grade card is filled in by the project supervisor.
pg_supervisor_open_project: To open a project you supervise:
pg_select_project_supervisor: Select the appropriate project from the list.
pg_add_links_files_supervisor: add and update links and files, including:
pg_criteria_appear_supervisor: Criteria will appear in the Criteria tab of the project.
pg_supervisor_can_lock: After entering all criteria, the supervisor can lock them from student editing by clicking the lock icon next to the criterion.
pg_grade_card_supervisor: The project view contains a grade card divided by semesters (first and second). This card is filled in by the project supervisor.
pg_fill_data_feed: Fill in the required data in the Data Feed tab.
pg_set_supervisor_availability: Set supervisor availability in the Project Groups tab.
pg_go_to_project_group: Go to the Project Group tab.
pg_fill_form_submit: Fill in the required fields and confirm the form by clicking Submit.
